item.title: Debug Tips
item.description: binding/0 Content binding/0 or binding/1 returns the binding for the given context as a keyword list. How to iex> binding() |> IO.inspect() iex> binding() |> inspect() |> Logger.info() Reference Elixir — quick reference for debugging techniques Elixir - binding(context \ nil)
